Text: This file contains audio glitches starting around 1:03:12.
The file (it is only one eleven-hour-long file) contains multiple glitches that are not incapacitating, but annoying nonetheless.  Otherwise, the sound is not bad.
hope this works just great, the book 1 audio was flawless hope this too

this is great apart from the audio glitch-skipping, it does remove the immersion of the audio book. i look forward to another one being uploaded without the skip for when i want to listen to this for a second time
up to Chapter 6, and the skipping makes it unlistenable. you are still able to understand the story, but whole sentences start to get skipped
The audio quality is horrendous, especially compared to the first book by the same uploader which was perfect.
pinpirin and nitrodave are correct is saying there are glitches/skips. I'm only 1:04:00 into it so far. if you can find another copy elsewhere, i'd suggest using it.
